title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 320.1 - Required forms supplied by the department
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 320.1 - Required forms supplied by the department

State Regulations

Local social services agencies shall use forms required
by and furnished by the department unless local equivalents thereof are
permitted and approved. A local equivalent may be in the form of punched cards, magnetic tape or other data processing media as well as printed records. The
use of a local equivalent as a substitute for any such required form shall be
approved by the department in advance of its use. Similarly, revisions of a
previously approved local equivalent form shall be approved by the department
in advance of its use. Approval shall be requested in accordance with the
instructions of the department. The provisions of this section shall also apply
to alternate required forms. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
320.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
